author: Special Correspondent
text:
Smarting from a sting operation that showed a number of party leaders allegedly accepting cash on camera, the ruling Trinamool on Monday described it as “smear campaign and a political conspiracy”. Top party officials said the video was “manufact-ured.” The Opposition demanded the Chief Minister’s resignation.

The video went viral on the social media. The portal claimed it had “52 hours” of content.
title: Trinamool sees conspiracy
